originalText.text: Dr. Bilal Chughtai is very personable , inspires trust and also is incredibly meticulous and thorough... does not rush  wants to make sure 100% about the patient's condition before going  any further with invasive procedures and that is something that is to be respected and appreciated !!! I do and trust him completely!!!!

originalText.text: Dr. Bilal Chugtai is an excellent physician.  Not only is he a highly skilled, knowledgeable and qualified urological surgeon who is up to date on the latest medical advances, he is also a kind person who has always been honest with me, and has been accessible and responsive to my questions.  Dr. Chugtai helped me through a significant medical crisis and with his skill and guidance I have been able to recover to a level that was not imaginable before I met with him.  His office has been excellent;  wait time is very brief, staff are very professional, the office is always immaculate and the equipment is state of the art.  I feel very fortunate that Dr. Chugtai is my physician and I recommend him without reservation.

originalText.text: My visit and previous visits have been very satisfactory, although I must see Dr. Bilal again.  Short wait time and good communication with office staff, technicians and Dr Bilal.  Although my particular condition has not been completely resolved, I feel certain that it will be thanks to the continuing attention from the doctor and staff.

originalText.text: An absolutely fantastic Doctor with matching parts knowledge, skill, and bedside manner.  Patient, caring, and genuinely concerned with the well-being of his patients. An outstanding gem in a day and age when most physicians lack empathy due to tremendous patient overload. Highly recommended.

originalText.text: Dr Chughtai and his team are excellent and responsive, which is very important. He is respectful and very articulate about explaining everything and all options. I trust him completely (and I am often a deeply skeptical person, so that's a big compliment).
